name: Realm Retribution
text: All attacks made by the target match your alignment, counting as either chaotic, evil, good, or lawful as appropriate. If your alignment includes multiple alignment components, such as lawful good, you select one alignment component to impart to the target. Whenever the target confirms a critical hit against or takes damage from a creature, that creature must attempt a Will save. On a failed save, the creature is sent to the Outer Plane matching your alignment, as per plane shift, and the spell ends. A warpriest treats this spell as a 6th-level cleric spell for the purposes of preparing the spell, determining DCs, and so forth.
savingThrow_zh: 意志, 通过则无效; 见文本
text_zh: 目标进行的所有攻击都会符合你的阵营，视情况被视为混乱、邪恶、善良或守序。如果你的阵营包括多个阵营成分，例如守序善良，你可以选择一个阵营成分赋予目标。每当目标确认对一个生物确认重击或受到一个生物的伤害时，该生物必须尝试一次意志豁免。如果豁免失败，该生物将如同受到异界传送效果一样，被送往与你的阵营相匹配的外层位面，然后法术结束。战争祭司在以准备该法术、确定DC等为目的时将该法术视为6环牧师法术。
